column2:
```r
sugar <- menu %>%
  select(Category,Item,Sugars) %>% 
  group_by(Category)

max_sugar <-sugar %>% 
  arrange(desc(Sugars)) %>% 
  head(10) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Sugars,
             y=reorder(Item,
                       Sugars),
             fill = Sugars)) +
  geom_col() + 
  theme_classic()+
  theme(legend.position = \none\") +

column1: position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) + ggtitle(\"Top 10 Menu items with the Highest Sugar Content\")
